text: @Swamy39 Hospitality, tourism, transport, taxi, airlines, service sector r directly impacted by lockdown Dear PM Modi ji, please announce PM Relief Fund covid19 urgently to cope with economic rehabilitation work for people affected due outbreak of virus &resultant lockdown.
